text: Dmytro Kravchenko (; born 25 February 1995) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for Metalist 1925 Kharkiv. ==Career== Kravchenko is a product of his native FC Vorskla School System. His first trainer was Volodymyr Plyevako. He made his debut for FC Vorskla in a game against FC Stal Kamianske on 21 August 2016 in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==International career== He also played for Ukrainian different youth national football teams. ==References == ==External links== *Statistics at FFU website (Ukr) * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Vorskla Poltava players Category:FC Metalist 1925 Kharkiv players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:People from Poltava Category:Association football midfielders
title: Dmytro Kravchenko
